snippet: Everton has beaten some of the English Premier League's richest teams despite having only a fraction of their budget, thanks to its clever manager.
abstract: Rob Hughes On Soccer column notes that Everton has beaten some of the English Premier League's richest soccer teams despite having only a fraction of their budget, thanks to its clever manager David Moyes
lead_paragraph: Everton has beaten some of the English Premier League's richest teams despite having only a fraction of their budget, thanks to its clever manager.

headline.main: 10 Years of Making Every Penny Count
headline.print_headline: A Decade of Making Every Penny Count
